revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ice Path |image = [[File:Ice Path.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ice Path. |tokens = 6,000 |location = Between Route 44 and 45, north of Blackthorn City. }} '''Ice Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 120,400 |- | Delibird (Boss) || 380,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Jynx * Swinub * Delibird (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
